meanings.sent1: The unsmoothed surface of the table felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The unsmoothed road caused the car to bump and shake.
meanings.sent3: The unsmoothed ice cream cone dripped all over my hand.
meanings.sent4: Her unsmoothed hair tangled in the wind like wild vines.
meanings.sent5: The unsmoothed glass shattered into a thousand tiny pieces.

meanings.sent1: The unsmoothed fabric had wrinkles and folds.
meanings.sent2: The unsmoothed wood showed the natural grain patterns.
meanings.sent3: The unsmoothed cake looked like a lopsided mountain.
meanings.sent4: His unsmoothed voice cracked with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The unsmoothed path was full of rocks and obstacles.

meanings.definition: Not having been made smooth or even
meanings.sent1: The unsmoothed wall had patches of uneven paint.
meanings.sent2: The unsmoothed paper had rough edges from tearing.
meanings.sent3: The unsmoothed blanket bunched up at the foot of the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her unsmoothed handwriting was difficult to read.
meanings.sent5: The unsmoothed ground was covered in bumps and dips.
